description:
A transfer student comes to Kaito`s class. His name is Li-Chi Long, a curt boy they met at the Big Money Hero Wars finals opening ceremony. Kaito takes a liking to him and half pushes Long into joining Big Money Company and treats him to his grandfather, Zouan Gosho`s, pickled plums. Long begins to open up to Kaito`s inherent cheerfulness bit by bit, however...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 波乱の転校生 ￥ 龍里千!!
